title: Can't come again on the name of this font…
content:
Hello -

Sorry…  
But I can't find again the name of this font.  
Seems a bit too generic for me.

Thank you for any help, have a nice day…

- Dimitri

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [screenshot\_ 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419103430/http:/typophile.com/files/screenshot_%201.png) | 80.92 KB |
author: dimitri_c

comments.content: Moving this thread to Type Id.

I wouldn't get that excited about it either.

Nick Cooke

Hi -

I'm not excited too, but I have to redraw this logotype, and they can't give me the original one (either the typeface name!).  
So any clue?

- Dimitri

Hello Dimitri,

closest I could find is a freebie called Republika:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419103430im_/http:/typophile.com/files/republika_4933.png)

Have a look at more similar typefaces in Mike’s [Bauhaus Style Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419103430/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces5.html).

F

——  
 [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419103430/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 " What do I enter in the “Title” line?")
